name: Homeless Tent
description:
## Homeless Tent

A nice and cozy tent for the homeless.

You can craft this item at the Blacksmith in the game.

## Supply

1000

### Crafting Costs

---

- 10 SFL

- 5 Wheat

- 5 Wood

- 5 Stone

[Link](https://docs.sunflower-land.com/crafting-guide)

### Contributor
